S.FORM: Peru Gaga kska Kska Hunac Meycow ka Peru, 10 00 S, 76 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,285,216 sq km(hangan na o Tg20) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,279,996 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 5,220 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 30,741,062 hiyi. Gaga Lima ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 28 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Peru ga wada sugan 18.80 ka dxgal qpahan, 53 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 28.20 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Pedro Pablo Kuczynski, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 7 jiyax 28pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
